desc: Shop STOP-FYRE® Fire Extinguishers by AKE Safety Equipment. Made in the United States. We offer a simpler, more intuitive, more reliable fire extinguisher so you can protect what’s most important. Our clean agent blend of fire suppression gases are non-corrosive and electrically non-conductive. Free USA shipping.

layout.text: Summer Handheld Sale ends 7/15 at midnight CST.
